ad_text: Euro Line Transportation Inc. Sponsored https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/eurolti We are looking for a regional/ local driver near Ontario, CA. ~~This job is Monday - Friday. ~~Some nights you will be home and some nights not, it will change periodically. ~~We are looking for someone to be flexible with their hours in this position. ~~Driver will need to do some local pick-ups and deliveries as well as go out of state to meet with other drivers to swap trailers and/or deliver. ~~We have a terminal in Ontario, CA, where all the equipment is and where drivers will swap trailers. Pay: .55cpm/$25hr. {{$$500 sign on bonus, if you stay with us up to 90 days we will pay $500}} ***THIS IS A 1099*** States: CA, NV, AZ, NM, TX. Absolute Requirements: ~Need 2 years experience ~At least 24 years of age. ~Reliable and trustworthy ~Good working smartphone for Texts, Calls and taking pictures! ~Familiar with ELD (BigRoad is a plus) ~Need to pass Drug Test and Criminal background. {{{{{{We Are looking to start someone as soon as possible!}}}}}} All of our trucks are 2018 and newer, and all automatic. Local/Regional near LA Transport Service Send message

Euro Line Transportation Inc. Sponsored https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/eurolti Seeking a professional driver for OTR. TEAMS AND SOLOS! SIGN ON BONUS $$500$$ $250 after 30days $250 after 90days (as long as the driver keeps all of our equipment clean and takes care of their truck, communicates with dispatch properly, doesn't waist any time, no violations or tickets in the 30 and 90 day bonus period.) We have a warehouse in Charlotte, NC and one in Ontario, CA. We need a responsible and safe Driver to drive back and forth, sometimes you will make it to Phoenix, AZ. ~ Driving from east coast to west coast ~ 90% of the loads will be drop and hook ~ Flexible Time off with a week notice ~ Safety Bonus (dot inspections) ~ Driver referral bonus ~ And much more!! ~ Start .50cpm or based on experience. Our Equipment: 2018+ Freightliner, Volvo, Westernstar (all automatic) 2018+ Dry van Absolute Requirements: ~Need 2 years experience ~At least 24 years of age. ~Reliable and trustworthy ~Good working smartphone for Texts, Calls and taking pictures! ~Familiar with ELD (BigRoad is a plus) ~Need to pass Drug Test and Criminal background. We Are looking to start someone as soon as possible! OTR Coast-Coast Class A Transport Service Send message
